reviewText: The video was absolutely powerful. It was phenomenal. Pastor Brian Keith Williams does an awesome job of giving step by step scripture reference explaining this teaching. I absolutely loved the end where everyone gets their soul back. I would love to have this on DVD; my VHS player is broken. God's Word is so true and every man a liar. People may not realize it, this teaching gives you real understanding about your future.  This is the future. Every household should own this.
